title: How does VaxCheck work?
description: VAXCheck enables you to upload your COVID-19 vaccination records through a secure HIPAA compliant platform and create a digital health pass that can be shared with travel authorities or demonstrate compliance with health entry rules for venues or other destinations.

title: Is the VAXCheck a contact tracing application?
description: No. The VAXCheck application is not a contact tracing app and does not collect location information on its users.

title: Do I need to create a VAXCheck account?
description: No, it is not required to create a VAXCheck account. However, if you want the ability to display your COVID vaccination and/or COVID lab results in a web app, you will need to create an account with VAXCheck.

title: Getting Started
extraLines: 1.) Login to the VAXCheck secure web portal to verify the information on your CDC vaccination card at https://vaxcheck.firstvitals.com/

2.) Input your PERSONAL email as your email address.  The reason we used your email address is to allow you to access the digital health pass for your personal use.  If you want to change your email address, please let us know.
3.) You will receive via email, a One-Time Password (OTP) to access your account information.
4.) Verify and if required, input or edit the vaccination information displayed.

title: What is the VAXCheck Health Pass?
description: The VAXCheck Health Pass is a verified health certificate of your CDC vaccination record which can be shared with travel and public venues in a way that doesn’t reveal any of your personal health information.

title: What information is shown on the VAXCheck Health Pass?
description: VAXCheck displays your name, effective date and expiration date of your verified CDC vaccination record. No personal health information is revealed.

title: How does VAXCheck obtain verification of my COVID vaccination record?
description: Upon receipt of your consent to have VAXCheck certify your CDC vaccination record, we will verify your information from any one of the following data sources; CDC VAMS, Electronic Health Records via a patient portal or directly with your vaccinator.

title: How does VAXCheck keep my personal data safe?
description: VAXCheck allows you to control who has access to your vaccination record. The digital vaccination record is managed on a HIPAA compliant platform.  It is secure, private and indelible: permissions and cryptography prevent unauthorized access to the health vault where your digital vaccination record is stored.  Privacy is maintained through cryptographic techniques and/or data partitioning techniques to give authorized users such as travel authority’s selective visibility into the ledger.  Participants cannot tamper with a record of the digital vaccination record.
extraLines: Pursuant to the privacy policy, you can remove or request deletion of your vaccination records at any time.

title: Who is VAXCheck?
description: VAXCheck is a vaccination verification service provided by FirstVitals Health and Wellness Inc, who is a licensed and credentialed healthcare provider.  As a healthcare provider, patient privacy and security of personal health information is a priority in its operations.
